Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Djedhor with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands holding a relief adze, a relief hoe(chipped) and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section bears a column of Hieroglyphic text in blue glaze; back-pillar and plinth.
Acquisition name: Transferred from: Victoria and Albert Museum (Department of Architecture and Sculpture)
